description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A Century after: picturesque glimpses of Philadelphia and Pennsylvania ... A pictorial representation of scenery, architecture, life, manners and character. Edited by R. H. Stoddard. Illustrated with engravings ... from designs by Thomas Moran, &c" Author: STODDARD, Richard Henry. Contributor: MORAN, Thomas - Landscape Painter Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10410.f.3." Page: 294 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1876 Publisher: Allen, Lane & Scott & J. W. Lauderbach Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003510777 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
